tool_description:
Real-time data, unofficial API skyscanner.com.
Search for a list of flights everywhere, roundtrip, one-way, multi-city like on the skyscanner.com website
name: Flight Data
title: Flight Data

api_list.name: flights/auto-complete

optional_parameters.name: placeTypes
optional_parameters.description:
It can input multiple values, and the values should be separated by commas
The  **/flights/search-multi-city**  endpoint is only used in the case placeTypes=CITY,AIRPORT
Ex: `CITY,AIRPORT`
`CITY`: City
`AIRPORT`: Airport
`COUNTRY`: Country

optional_parameters.name: outboundDate
optional_parameters.description:
Format:  `YYYY-MM-DD`
Default value: Current date

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description:
`market` can be retrieved from /get-config endpoint(data->market)
Ex: `US`
Default value: `US`

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description:
`locale` can be retrieved from /get-config endpoint(data->locale)
Ex: `en-US`
Default value: `en-US`

api_list.name: flights/search-incomplete
api_list.description:
Get full data for  **/flights/search-roundtrip** or  **/flights/search-one-way** or  **/flights/search-multi-city**  endpoint

You need to call the API multiple times until the item status is 'complete'(data->context->status=complete)

required_parameters.name: sessionId
required_parameters.description:
From location
Required: true
`fromEntityId` can be retrieved from /flights/auto-complete endpoint(data->presentation->id)
Ex: `eyJlIjoiMjc1Mzc1NDIiLCJzIjoiTllDQSIsImgiOiIyNzUzNzU0MiJ9` (New York)

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description:
`locale` can be retrieved from /get-config endpoint(data->locale)
Ex: `en-US`
Default value: `en-US`

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description:
`market` can be retrieved from /get-config endpoint(data->market)
Ex: `US`
Default value: `US`

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description:
`currency` can be retrieved from /get-config endpoint(data->currency)
Ex: `USD`
Default value: `USD`

api_list.name: flights/search-roundtrip
api_list.description:
flights/search-roundtrip

In case the status is 'incomplete'(data->context->status=incomplete), you need to use the /flights/search-incomplete endpoint to get the full data until the status is 'complete'(data->context->status=complete)

required_parameters.name: departDate
required_parameters.description:
Depart date
Required: true
Format: `YYYY-MM-DD`
Ex: `2024-02-14`

required_parameters.name: toEntityId
required_parameters.description:
To location
`toEntityId` can be retrieved from /flights/auto-complete endpoint(data->presentation->id) or the response of endpoint(data->everywhereDestination/countryDestination->results->id)
Ex: `eyJlIjoiMjk0NzUwODUiLCJzIjoiUFIifQ==` (Puerto Rico)

required_parameters.name: returnDate
required_parameters.description:
Return date
Required: true
Format: `YYYY-MM-DD`
Ex: `2024-02-15`

required_parameters.name: fromEntityId
required_parameters.description:
From location
Required: true
`fromEntityId` can be retrieved from /flights/auto-complete endpoint(data->presentation->id)
Ex: `eyJlIjoiMjc1Mzc1NDIiLCJzIjoiTllDQSIsImgiOiIyNzUzNzU0MiJ9` (New York)

optional_parameters.name: children
optional_parameters.description:
Children: 2-12 years
Ex: `4`
Default value: `0`

optional_parameters.name: infants
optional_parameters.description:
Infants: Under 2 years
Ex: `1`
Default value: `0`

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description:
`currency` can be retrieved from /get-config endpoint(data->currency)
Ex: `USD`
Default value: `USD`

optional_parameters.name: cabinClass
optional_parameters.description:
Cabin class
Ex: `economy`
Default value: `economy`

`economy`: Economy
`premium_economy`: Premium Economy
`business`: Business
`first`: First

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description:
`market` can be retrieved from /get-config endpoint(data->market)
Ex: `US`
Default value: `US`

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description:
`locale` can be retrieved from /get-config endpoint(data->locale)
Ex: `en-US`
Default value: `en-US`

optional_parameters.name: adults
optional_parameters.description:
Adults: 12+ years
Ex: `3`
Default value: `1`

api_list.name: flights/price-calendar

required_parameters.name: fromEntityId
required_parameters.description:
From location
Required: true
`fromEntityId` can be retrieved from /flights/auto-complete endpoint(data->presentation->id)
Ex: `eyJlIjoiMjc1Mzc1NDIiLCJzIjoiTllDQSIsImgiOiIyNzUzNzU0MiJ9` (New York)

Ex: `2024-02-14`

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description:
`market` can be retrieved from /get-config endpoint(data->market)
Ex: `US`
Default value: `US`

optional_parameters.name: toEntityId
optional_parameters.description:
To location
`fromEntityId` can be retrieved from /flights/auto-complete endpoint(data->presentation->id)
Ex: `eyJlIjoiMzUyMzQ4OTIiLCJzIjoiTVNZQSIsImgiOiIzNTIzNDg5MiJ9`

Default value: `anywhere`

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description:
`currency` can be retrieved from /get-config endpoint(data->currency)
Ex: `USD`
Default value: `USD`

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description:
`locale` can be retrieved from /get-config endpoint(data->locale)
Ex: `en-US`
Default value: `en-US`

api_list.name: get-config
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flight-data24.p.rapidapi.com/get-config"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flight-data24.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://flight-data24.p.rapidapi.com/get-config"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flight-data24.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
